name: Speed Demon
wikiSummary: "Speed Demon" is a track off of Michael Jackson's 1987 album 'Bad'. The song is often remembered for it's music video, which was fully animated in Claymation. Jackson takes on the role of an animated rabbit riding a motorcycle, trying to escape from the paparazzi. At the very end of the video, he comes of his rabbit costume, only to have the rabbit come to life and challenge him to a dance-off.
wikiText:
"Speed Demon" is a track off of Michael Jackson's 1987 album 'Bad'. The song is often remembered for it's music video, which was fully animated in Claymation. Jackson takes on the role of an animated rabbit riding a motorcycle, trying to escape from the paparazzi. At the very end of the video, he comes of his rabbit costume, only to have the rabbit come to life and challenge him to a dance-off.
